Articles.Content: Has anyone ever found an anomaly on eve? I believe that there is one but no one has found it because Eve is seems to be ignored by players and is very large so an anomaly could be hiding somewhere in those big mountains. I would like too know if there is one so I could find it or if has been proven that there isn't one. Please let me know in the comments. Thank you.
I thought there was the Magic Boulder there somewhere.

I thought there was the Magic Boulder there somewhere.

I thought Ike had the magic boulder.

That said I only went to eve on one of my playthroughs, though I did explore quite a bit (at least in terms of time) I found nothing.

Has anyone ever found an anomaly on eve? I believe that there is one but no one has found it because Eve is seems to be ignored by players and is very large so an anomaly could be hiding somewhere in those big mountains. I would like too know if there is one so I could find it or if has been proven that there isn't one. Please let me know in the comments. Thank you.

You cant prove a negative. What I can say is that I've enumerated all the objects on each celestial body's surface available through the API, and there's nothing in the list on Eve. Eve is all one big magnificent purple nightmare.

I thought there was the Magic Boulder there somewhere.

The magic boulder is orbiting Ike.

I thought Ike had the magic boulder.

That said I only went to eve on one of my playthroughs, though I did explore quite a bit (at least in terms of time) I found nothing.

Magic Boulder got removed (It used orbit Ike), and IIRC, Eve has no easter eggs.
Yea, Eve has no Easter eggs, and the Magic Boulder is still MIA.

hmmm, I could have swore there was a floating rock hovering just above the surface of Eve, maybe not though.

Edited August 24, 2013 by Haze-Zero
Gilly. you saw Gilly-no you didn't. too small.
It may be small by Eve standards but I've driven a rover across roughly 200KM and never saw anything.

No proper anomalies on Eve that I am aware of.

There was a very prominent volcano like mountain. However I think that was lost in the last art pass.

Yea, Eve has no Easter eggs, and the Magic Boulder is still MIA.

That's a shame, 'cause it's mentioned in the description text for an Ike surface EVA.
